data.title: Nearest Shrunken Centroids With Python
data.description: Nearest Centroids is a linear classification machine learning algorithm. It involves predicting a class label for new examples based on which class-based centroid the example is closest to from the training dataset. The Nearest Shrunken Centroids algorithm is an extension that involves shifting class-based centroids toward the centroid of the entire training dataset and removing […]
